name: The Last Space Ship
overview: The Last Space Ship is a vertcially scrolling shoot 'em up for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Roberto Ricioppo using the Shoot 'em Up Construction Kit and released by TND in 2013. The aim of this game is to fly through various zones, zapping away at mutant controlled space crafts. If you get very far, you'll win, otherwise if they succeed to blowing up your last ship. Its all over. Good luck.
